text: Noboru Aomi (born 5 December 1938) is a Japanese wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman middleweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Japan Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Niigata Prefecture
title: Noboru Aomi
